snippet: The police said Monday that Maoist rebels had ambushed a government patrol in a mountainous area of eastern India, killing at least seven soldiers and wounding seven more.
lead_paragraph: The police said Monday that Maoist rebels had ambushed a government patrol in a mountainous area of eastern India, killing at least seven soldiers and wounding seven more.

headline.seo: India: Maoists Ambush Patrol, Killing 7 Soldiers
headline.main: India: Maoists Ambush Patrol, Killing 7 Soldiers
headline.print_headline: India: Maoists Ambush Patrol, Killing 7 Soldiers
